title: New Era of Deals for College Players Means Business Considerations, Like Taxes
description: The April 18 tax deadline is coming. College basketball players have been busy with the N.C.A.A. tournaments. Some factored that into their endorsement deals.
dc:creator: Billy Witz
media:credit: Robert Deutsch/USA Today Sports, via Reuters
media:description: Duke guard Trevor Keels waited to make any endorsement deals until Jan. 1, so he would not have to file taxes until 2023.
